definitions: Cause to go or be taken to a particular destination; arrange for the delivery of, especially by post.
Cause (a message or computer file) to be transmitted electronically.
Order or instruct to go to a particular destination or in a particular direction.
Cause to move sharply or quickly; propel.
Arrange for someone to go to (an institution) and stay there for a particular purpose.
Cause to be in a specified state.
Affect with powerful emotion; put into ecstasy.
